item.title: Writing My Blog Posts with Org
item.description: Hugo is an awesome blog generator. However, it’s primary content mode is Markdown, and writing in org-mode feels much better than writing in Markdown. org-mode can automatically convert to Markdown, but then I have to edit the generated Markdown file to add YAML front-matter that Hugo consumes, which is annoying. Enter ox-hugo. It allows you to maintain and generate Hugo-compatible Markdown in org-mode, and automatically generates the necessary metadata Hugo requires.
